issue.title: [Python] Parquet tests should be optional
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1915](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1915). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Two decimal tests in `test_parquet.py` are missing the @parquet decorator to allow skipping if parquet is not install, resulting in failure

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1915?focusedCommentId=16288367) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1415
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1415>
